src:
Descarta AMLO denunciar red de bots | Entérate
 by Redacción AN / AL



El presidente Andrés Manuel López Obrador afirmó que no denunciará la red de bots que presuntamente opera la cuenta “Tumbaburros”, porque se garantiza la libertad de expresión y en su gobierno está prohibido prohibir.
text:
AMLO dismisses denouncing bot network | Find out
 by AN / AL Writing



President Andrés Manuel López Obrador said he will not denounce the botnet that allegedly operates the “Tumbaburros” account, because freedom of expression is guaranteed and his government is prohibited from prohibiting.
